archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Modify Marketing Campaign
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Brief Description Modify a marketing campaign to improve its effectiveness based on metric analysis or based on feedback from recipients or stakeholders. Extended Description Modify Marketing Campaign updates a marketing campaign to improve its effectiveness based on metric analysis or based on feedback from recipients or stakeholders.
It may also extend the end date of a marketing campaign if warranted and modify the campaign message based on feedback from the market and external stakeholders.
